title: What is appeal of PewDiePie
body:
So I'd never watched one of his videos till 5 minutes ago, and it was just in the suggestions was like "oh that's that pewdiepie guy, let's see what the big deal is"

I watch video, it's literally just him screaming at his screen and playing the game in the most trolly non serious way possible (purposely hindering his own success) now I could understand if there was some clever humorous value you know mixed in, but it was just like random screaming "OMG IM DIEING" etc.

So watched another video to make sure it wasn't just one bad video and they are pretty much all the same. 32 million people have seen those videos and hit subscribe, I then went to that Smosh channel to check their subs to see if people gravitating towards retardation was a common theme because I think their videos are garbage as well and they had 19mill subs. So what is the appeal to Pewdiepie?

Pewdiepie to me just seems like a terrible version of videogamedunkey with every ounce of cleverness or 'talent' just completely stripped away. (I am obviously aware that pewdiepie was around far before dunkey)

replies.body:
> it's 12vie humour

Can't really put it any more accurately.

> it's 12vie humour

This. And nothing more.

its 12vie humor.
also i think its the pewdiepie phenomenon, where if u use webcam and scream like a %%%%% people feel bad for you and give them likes. Case in point: Markiplier, pewdiepie.

0% content 100% screaming.

if anyone would test the theory of the pewdiepie phenomenon and perhaps earn mad Youtube Dollahs, get back to me on your results
We just watch it for the rare glimpse of his GF obviously.
She has her own channel doe.

He is attractive and donates to lots of charities and is genuinely a great person and how dare you put down mah pewds.

Nah to each their own if you don't like it don't watch it, but as you have seen... there are plenty of people who do like it. Just because you don't doesn't make it bad.

I don't think it's '12vie' humour.

Well.

Yeah it kinda is.

Oh.
He is attractive and has a cute accent.
